Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.

m + S n = S n + m

Example 2:

- simpl. auto.

Inductive name : Set := Primary : name | Backup : name

Inductive step_ordered (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation ordered_network (Net.name * (input + output)) := StepOrdered_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (m : Net.msg) (ms : list Net.msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (from to : Net.name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_ordered net net' tr Arguments step_ordered {P params} Arguments StepOrdered_deliver {P params} _ [net'] [tr]%list_scope [m] [ms out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope _ [to] Arguments StepOrdered_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [tr out]%list_scope [inp d] [l]%list_scope
StepOrdered_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (m : Net.msg) (ms : list Net.msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (from to : Net.name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate Net.name_eq_dec to (update2 Net.name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> step_ordered net net' tr
StepFailureDiskOp_drop : forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwdoPackets := xs ++ ys; nwdoState := nwdoState net; nwdoDisk := nwdoDisk net |} -> step_failure_disk_ops (failed, net) (failed, net') [] where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
StepAsync_input : forall (h : Net.name) (net net' : network) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), input_handlers h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets h l ++ nwPackets net; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d |} -> step_async net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)]
StepFailureDiskOp_dup : forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwdoPackets := p :: xs ++ p :: ys; nwdoState := nwdoState net; nwdoDisk := nwdoDisk net |} -> step_failure_disk_ops (failed, net) (failed, net') [] where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]

```  
intros net net' tr H.
induction H.
- constructor.
- eapply StepAsync_input.  
  + eassumption.
  + reflexivity.
